mapper.select: select * from tbl_score_detail WHERE foreign_id != 0 and status=1 and type = 1 and foreign_id = #{foreignId} and member_id = #{memberId} and score_rule_id = #{scoreRuleId}

select * from tbl_score_detail WHERE member_id=#{memberId} and score_rule_id=#{scoreRuleId} and status=1
and to_days(create_time) = to_days(now())
and yearweek(date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')) = yearweek(now());
and date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m') = date_format(now(),'%Y-%m')
and year(create_time) = year(NOW())
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_score_detail(create_time,member_id,type,score,balance,remark,foreign_id,score_rule_id) values(now(),#{memberId},#{type},#{score},(SELECT score FROM tbl_member WHERE id=#{memberId}),#{remark},#{foreignId},#{scoreRuleId})
UPDATE tbl_score_detail SET status=0 WHERE id=#{id}
